meta.name: Ali Alhussein
meta.jobTitle: Software Developer: Creating and Developing Web Apps.
meta.summary:
I am a fresh software engineering graduate specializing in web development with 3 years of experience, by self-learning, and I am seeking new opportunities in the field. and I am a committed, motivated, creative, and dedicated professional.
I've built many web applications and websites through my self-learning journey since 2019. Additionally, I got 1st place with my graduation project in the semester of Feb 2022. Finally, I participated in ICPC at the local level and got 12th place in the Aleppo University contest in 2019.
I am skilled in full-stack web development using MERN-stack: React JS and Next.js

projects.name: Pinfo
projects.caption: A social media application for sharing photos, The user can log in through a Google account and share his photos with other users. The application supports the comment feature on images, and it has the ability to filter by categories and search for images within the application.
projects.description: A social media application for sharing photos, The user can log in through a Google account and share his photos with other users. The application supports the comment feature on images, and it has the ability to filter by categories and search for images within the application.

projects.name: CVT Platform
projects.caption: A web application that works as a platform for building a resume and portfolio for job seekers.
projects.description: A web application that works as a platform for building a resume and portfolio for job seekers.

projects.name: Next Events
projects.caption: An application to publish upcoming events with the ability to add comments and discussion.
projects.description: An application to publish upcoming events with the ability to add comments and discussion.

projects.name: 4G Team Website
projects.caption: This is a web application that I created in 2019 for Ebla Private university students in Aleppo.
projects.description:
This is a web application that I created in 2019 for Ebla Private university students in Aleppo.

This application is designed in a simple and easy-to-use manner to help university students browse and download lectures at any time they want. I also feel proud that I offer this service to my colleagues completely free of charge.

accomplishments.name: Graduation Project
accomplishments.description: First place in the graduation projects in my semester with a grade of 95

accomplishments.name: ACM
accomplishments.description: 12th place in the collegiate programming contest ACM - University of Aleppo.
